dcterms:description: The ICASSP-2022 AEC dataset is used for training and evaluating models for acoustic echo cancellation, providing a benchmark for performance comparison.
dcterms:title: ICASSP-2022 AEC dataset

dcterms:creator: C. K. Reddy
H. Dubey
V. Gopal
R. Cutler
S. Braun
H. Gamper
R. Aichner
S. Srinivasan
dcterms:description: The multilingual dataset contains clean speech data in various languages, used to generate far-end and near-end audio for acoustic echo cancellation.
dcterms:title: Multilingual data

dcterms:creator: D. Snyder
G. Chen
D. Povey
dcterms:description: The Musan dataset is a corpus containing music, speech, and noise, used to simulate background noise for acoustic echo cancellation.
dcterms:title: Musan dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Ko
V. Peddinti
D. Povey
M. L. Seltzer
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The impulse response (IR) dataset contains real and simulated impulse responses used to create realistic echo signals in acoustic echo cancellation.
dcterms:title: Impulse response (IR) dataset

dcterms:creator: J. B. Allen
D. A. Berkley
dcterms:description: The image method dataset is used for simulating small-room acoustics, providing a theoretical basis for impulse response generation.
dcterms:title: Image method for simulating small-room acoustics
